issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

comments.body:
conversation here: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/appc-ti-alloy/5hV7FpWPWxs

In short, adding arguments into the TSS is messy and unintuitive for other developers inspecting code. Dynamic styling and ALOY-362 would make this unnecessary.
Closing this ticket in favor of Dynamic Styling and ALOY-362 as per Tony's comments.
